publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-6# Dennis Canavan: Falkirk Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Football Club on winning the Scottish Football League First Division Championship and believes that Falkirk Football Club now deserves to be promoted to the Scottish Premier League.

S2M-6# Dennis Canavan: Falkirk Football Clubâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Football Club on winning the Scottish Football League First Division Championship and believes that Falkirk Football Club now deserves to be promoted to the Scottish Premier League.
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Michael Matheson*, David Mundell*, Fergus Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*, Phil Gallie*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Mr Brian Monteith*, Jim Mather*
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Karen Gillon*
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Cathy Peattie*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Helen Eadie*
S2M-6# Falkirk Football Club (lodged on 8 May 2003) Brian Adam*
